amendment.description: To prohibit implementation of title IV and title VI until the President determines that implementation of such titles will strengthen the national security of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3994 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 16. Record Vote Number: 122.

action.text: Amendment SA 3994 proposed by Senator Salazar. (consideration: CR S4577-4585; text: CR S4577) To prohibit implementation of title IV and title VI until the President determines that implementation of such titles will strengthen the national security of the United States.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3994 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 16. Record Vote Number: 122.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3994 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 16. Record Vote Number: 122.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3994 proposed by Senator Salazar.
